    • Constructor Detail

      • Circuit

        public Circuit(int numberOfBatteries,
       int voltagePerBattery)
        Constructs a Circuit object. Voltage for Circuits depends on the number of batteries and the voltage per battery.
        Parameters:
        numberOfBatteries - The number of batteries in the circuit.
        voltagePerBattery - The supplied emf per single battery.

    • Method Detail

      • getTotalVoltage

        public int getTotalVoltage(int numberOfBatteries,
                  int voltagePerBattery)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Calculates total voltage. Total voltage = batteries * voltage per battery.
        Returns:
        The total voltage calculated by multiplying the number of batteries and voltage per battery.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
